title: Un Bon Petit Diable (1983) France DVDR
description:
Un Bon Petit Diable (1983) France

IMDB - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086503/

"Un bon petit diable" comes back to childhood. One of the comtesse de Segur's most popular works, it tells the tale of an orphan, Charles, mistreated by his wicked old cousin Madame Mac Miche (the part was tailor made for late Alice Sapricht); nevertheless, Charles has many friends including sweet blind young Juliette and her sister Marianne, Mac Miche's maid, Betty (Bernadette Laffont), her boyfriend Donald, and even the judge.

Directed by: Jean-Claude Brialy
Cast: Alice Sapritch, Philippe Clay, Michel Creton, Bernadette Lafont, etc.

DVD with extras.
